newsitem.title: USA: CCC seeks U.S. wheat for donation to Tajikistan.
newsitem.headline: CCC seeks U.S. wheat for donation to Tajikistan.

text.p: The Commodity Credit Corp said on Tuesday it is seeking up to 16,000 tonnes of U.S. No. 2 hard red winter or soft red winter or soft white wheat for donation to Tajikistan.
Shipment period is set for September 15-October 10. Offers are due on August 29.
The CCC, which is part of the U.S. Department of Agriculture, said the wheat must come from U.S. areas where Karnal Bunt (Tilletia Indica) is not known to occur. It must also be tested for vomitoxin.
